description.narrative: (USAID Southern Africa Regional): This mechanism will increase intra-regional trade with a focus on agricultural products and improve food security by improving the competitiveness of commodity value chains, leveraging South African capital and advanced agricultural technology, and promoting better management practices and improved infrastructure. Support will also be provided to improve the agricultural enabling environment with a specific focus on reducing the time and cost of trading across borders. This will be done by deploying proven trade facilitation tools and measures such as customs connectivity, national single windows, World Trade Organization (WTO) enquiry points, and trade repositories in Feed the Future focus and aligned countries as well as their key trading partners. Support will also be given to improve trade, investment and economic integration through harmonized technical and sanitary & phytosanitary standards to comply with countries' WTO commitments.
